Home/Contact

WunderFarms

Goal:

Wunderfarms was a new CSA that needed a website and branding. Wunderfarms was founded from several community garden that had a large educational arm. Our goal was to educate about where our vegetables come from, showcase the community that supports these farms, and give resources and education, while also providing a way for interested clients to contact us.

Insight:

If you ever go to a garden run by Ray Wunderlich, the first thing you notice is the large amount of Collard greens in the farm. We wanted to create a logo that emulated an old rustic farm feeling, while also being unique. Illustrations are always a part of the farmerâ€™s almanac, so I used that as inspiration for the logo.

Outcome:

The logo is a clean simple classic logo using a serif font and simple illustration. The colors are based off the earth and the website is showcases education on where the compost comes from, how our compost is built, where the gardens are, and how to contact the owner in a simple manner.
